summary: This mod add new race - Oread
descriptionHtml:
================
DESCRIPTION
================
In Greek mythology, an Oread or Orestiad (??????? / ?????????? from ????, \"mountain\") was a type of nymph that lived in mountains, valleys, ravines. They differ from each other according to their dwelling: the Idaeae were from Mount Ida, Peliades from Mount Pelion, etc. They were associated with Artemis, since the goddess, when she went out hunting, preferred mounts and rocky precipices.


Oread abilities:
2H weapon - 15
1H weapon - 15
Block - 5
Smithing - 5
Light Armor - 15 
Eloquence - 15


This race has:
-Unique body and head texture
-5 variants of new eyes
-4 unique race complexion 
-2 unique warpaints


NO REQUIREMENTS

============
INSTALL
============
Put into Data Folder


=============
UNINSTALL
=============
Delete esp file
meshes/oread
textures/oread


==============
CREDITS
==============
Clethcleth Yyna and TairenSoul for testing and screens (Thanks girls!)
author: Den987
